properties.description: Ketton Library is a public library which is part of Rutland County Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including children's books, large print and audiobooks, free wifi and computers, board games and more. The library is open extra hours thanks to our volunteers, who run the site on Thursday mornings.
properties.title: Ketton Library

properties.description: To improve the wellbeing of people living, working and learning in Stamford through a community approach. We aim to create a safe place where people can come and be themselves in a warm community atmosphere that enables everyone to be better connected, practise the 5 ways to wellbeing and where individuals are empowered to share their skills, knowledge and resources for the benefit of the whole Stamford community.
properties.title: MindSpace Stamford

properties.description: Open to all, come along for a cuppa, cake, conversation and maybe a game or 2.
properties.title: Night Light Cafe

properties.description: Oundle Library is a public library which is part of North Northants Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including Large Print and audiobooks, local studies, a garden, and activities for all ages including board games and more. We are open 9-5 Mondays to Fridays and 10-2 on Saturdays.
properties.title: Oundle Library

properties.description: Ryhall Library is a public library which is part of Rutland County Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including children's books, large print and audiobooks, free wifi and computers, board games and more. The library is open extra hours thanks to our volunteers, who run the site on Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday afternoons.
properties.title: Ryhall Library
